### 💡 Strategic Suggestion (Your SAVVI-Inspired Buffering Idea)

> “Perhaps we might want to go over and even if we're double counting for some, we can have the double count be our buffer and stretch our goals to ensure single counting satisfies as well.”

- **SAVVI had margin over M&E expectations**, which can be used as a precedent.
